scripts.web:build: cd web && npm run typegen && npm run build
scripts.extensions:install: npm run work-order-shopify-order:install && cd extensions && npm install && cd .. && npm run extensions:common-pos:install && npm run extensions:cycle-count-pos:install && npm run extensions:stock-transfer-pos:install && npm run extensions:new-work-order-pos:install && npm run extensions:purchase-orders-pos:install && npm run extensions:work-orders-pos:install && npm run extensions:work-orders-pos-internals:install && npm run extensions:work-order-sync:install && npm run extensions:serials-pos:install && npm run extensions:variant-scan-config-admin:install && npm run extensions:smart-scanner-pos:install
scripts.extensions:build: npm run work-order-shopify-order:build && npm run extensions:common-pos:build && npm run extensions:work-orders-pos-internals:build && npm run extensions:cycle-count-pos:build && npm run extensions:stock-transfer-pos:build && npm run extensions:new-work-order-pos:build && npm run extensions:purchase-orders-pos:build && npm run extensions:work-orders-pos:build && npm run extensions:work-order-sync:build && npm run extensions:serials-pos:build && npm run extensions:variant-scan-config-admin:build && npm run extensions:smart-scanner-pos:build
scripts.extensions:clean: npm run work-order-shopify-order:clean && cd extensions && npm run clean && cd .. && npm run extensions:common-pos:clean && npm run extensions:cycle-count-pos:clean && npm run extensions:stock-transfer-pos:clean && npm run extensions:new-work-order-pos:clean && npm run extensions:purchase-orders-pos:clean && npm run extensions:work-orders-pos:clean && npm run extensions:work-orders-pos-internals:clean && npm run extensions:work-order-sync:clean && npm run extensions:serials-pos:clean && npm run extensions:variant-scan-config-admin:clean && npm run extensions:smart-scanner-pos:clean
scripts.admin:install: npm install && npm run web:install && npm run web:frontend:install && npm run common:install && npm run work-order-shopify-order:install
scripts.admin:build: npm run work-order-shopify-order:build && npm run web:build && npm run common:build && npm run web:frontend:build
scripts.admin:clean: npm run work-order-shopify-order:clean && npm run web:clean && npm run web:frontend:clean && npm run common:clean
scripts.all:install: npm run admin:install && npm run extensions:install
scripts.all:build: npm run admin:build && npm run extensions:build
scripts.all:clean: npm run admin:clean && npm run extensions:clean && rm -rf node_modules
